review_data.title: Klein aber fein
review_data.content: Die Bar ist relativ klein aber hübsch eingerichtet. An einem Samstag Abend fanden wir zu zweit problemlos einen Tisch. Preise...More

review_data.title: Kellner überfordert, Mojito ohne Alkohol?
review_data.content: Der Kellner war nett, hatte aber keinen Überblick. Der Cocktail war ziemlich teuer, hatte dafür aber eine schwindend geringe Alkoholmenge.

review_data.title: Good cocktails
review_data.content: I went to this bar for the third time recently. The cocktails were really good. The service was very friendly but they could sell way more drinks by being more attentive. The decoration is not very attractive for me but I would come back for...More

review_data.title: very crowdy
review_data.content: It was very crowdy and loud - maybe because of friday evening :) Place full of young people visiting it before going to club. You will find here also loud talks and loud music and a bit slowly service (busy)

review_data.title: Awesome
review_data.content: Super Bedienung in gedigenem Ambiente. Sehr zentral gelegen im malerischen Niederdorf in Zürich. Immer wieder ein Besuch wert.

review_data.title: Muito bom
review_data.content: O Ba Ba Lu Bar serve porções variadas, possui música ao vivo, possui um cardápio muito bom, ótimo atendimento e...More

review_data.title: Bar with potential in Niederdorf, but not very welcoming
review_data.content: This mellow bar located in the Niederdorf has a few sidewalk tables and inside high ceiling, bar & stool seating, padded benches and sofas along the wall surrounding round silver tables. The music was good and there also seemed to be a special art exhibit...More

review_data.title: Cool and hip bar in Niederdorf
review_data.content: Ba Ba Lu is a stylish bar in a side alley of Niederdorf in downtown Zürich. The furnishing is modern.They have excellent drinks and supersize them to big ones (0.5l) for 5 CHF. A great option to have drinks with your friends!
